about.title: Mountain Apartment
about.description1: Welcome to Tatry Home, a charming apartment nestled in the picturesque Kościelisko village, just 6 km from Zakopane. Our spacious accommodation features two comfortable bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a cozy living area with breathtaking mountain views.
about.description2: Whether you're planning a family vacation, a romantic getaway, or an adventure with friends, our apartment provides the perfect base to explore the beauty of the Tatra Mountains all year round.
